title: Bye Bye Bao Bao, America's Favorite Panda
text:
Bye Bye Bao Bao, Americaâ€™s Favorite Panda 
The Smithsonian National Zoo is saying goodbye to its most famous resident, Bao Bao the panda cub, who is heading to China. Previous
